snippet: The United Nations was charged in a lawsuit with gross negligence in Haiti’s cholera epidemic, and accused by an anticorruption organization of oversight lapses in its own peacekeeping operations.
abstract: United Nations is charged in a lawsuit with gross negligence in Haiti’s cholera epidemic, and accused by an anticorruption organization of oversight lapses in its own peacekeeping operations.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations was charged in a lawsuit with gross negligence in Haiti’s cholera epidemic, and accused by an anticorruption organization of oversight lapses in its own peacekeeping operations.

headline.main: Peacekeeping by U.N. Faces New Scrutiny on 2 Fronts
headline.print_headline: Peacekeeping By U.N. Faces New Scrutiny On 2 Fronts
